nchack
  • Docs »
  • API
  • View page source

API¶

Trackers¶

Creating a tracker¶

NCTracker([start])

A tracker/log for manipulating netcdf files

open_data([x])

Create a new tracker

Attributes¶

NCTracker.start

The starting file or files of the tracker

NCTracker.current

The current file or files in the tracker

NCTracker.history

The history of operations on the tracker

NCTracker.size

The size of the tracker.

NCTracker.run

Is the tracker in run or lazy eval mode?

Variable modification¶

NCTracker.rename(self, newnames[, silent, cores])

Rename variables in a tracker.

NCTracker.mutate(self[, operations, silent, ...])

Create new variables using mathematical expressions, and keep original variables

NCTracker.transmute(self[, operations, ...])

Create new variables using mathematical expressions, and drop original variables

NCTracker.set_longname(self, var_dict[, silent])

Set long name of variables.

NCTracker.set_unit(self, var_dict[, silent])

Set the units for variables

NCTracker.set_missing(self, value[, silent, ...])

Set the missing value for a single number or a range

Vertical/level methods¶

NCTracker.bottom(self[, silent, cores])

Extract the bottom level from a tracker

NCTracker.surface(self[, silent, cores])

Extract the top/surface level from a tracker

NCTracker.vertical_interp(self[, ...])

Verticaly interpolate a tracker based on given depths

NCTracker.vertical_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the depth-averaged mean

NCTracker.vertical_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the depth-averaged minimum

NCTracker.vertical_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the depth-averaged maximum

NCTracker.vertical_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the depth-averaged range

Rolling methods¶

NCTracker.rolling_mean(self, window[, ...])

Calculate a rolling mean based on a window.

NCTracker.rolling_min(self, window[, ...])

Calculate a rolling minimum based on a window.

NCTracker.rolling_max(self, window[, ...])

Calculate a rolling maximum based on a window.

NCTracker.rolling_sum(self, window[, ...])

Calculate a rolling sum based on a window.

NCTracker.rolling_range(self, window[, ...])

Calculate a rolling range based on a window.

Evaluation setting¶

NCTracker.lazy(self)

A method to set the mode to lazy

NCTracker.release(self[, silent, cores, ...])

Run commands on tracker set to lazy/hold mode

Cleaning functions¶

cleanup()

deep_clean()

Ensemble creation¶

create_ensemble([path, var, recursive])

Generate an ensemble

generate_ensemble([path, recursive])

A candidate ensemble generator.

Arithemetic methods¶

NCTracker.mutate(self[, operations, silent, ...])

Create new variables using mathematical expressions, and keep original variables

NCTracker.transmute(self[, operations, ...])

Create new variables using mathematical expressions, and drop original variables

Ensemble statistics¶

NCTracker.ensemble_percentile(self[, p, silent])

Calculate an ensemble percentile from a multi-file tracker

NCTracker.ensemble_mean(self[, vars, ...])

Calculate an ensemble mean from a multi-file tracker

NCTracker.ensemble_min(self[, vars, ...])

Calculate an ensemble minimum from a multi-file tracker

NCTracker.ensemble_max(self[, vars, ...])

Calculate an ensemble maximum from a multi-file tracker

NCTracker.ensemble_range(self[, silent])

Calculate an ensemble range from a multi-file tracker

Subsetting operations¶

NCTracker.clip(self[, lon, lat, silent, cores])

Clip a tracker to a lon/lat box

NCTracker.select_months(self, months[, ...])

Select months from tracker

NCTracker.select_season(self, season[, ...])

Select season from tracker

NCTracker.select_years(self, years[, ...])

Select years from tracker

NCTracker.select_variables(self[, vars, ...])

Select variables from tracker

NCTracker.remove_variable

Time-based methods¶

NCTracker.set_date(self, year, month, day[, ...])

Set the date in a tracker.

NCTracker.select_months(self, months[, ...])

Select months from tracker

NCTracker.select_season(self, season[, ...])

Select season from tracker

NCTracker.select_years(self, years[, ...])

Select years from tracker

Interpolation methods¶

NCTracker.regrid(self[, grid, method, ...])

Regrid a tracker for a target grid and remapping method

NCTracker.time_interp(self[, start_date, ...])

Temporally interpolate variables based on date range and time resolution

Masking methods¶

NCTracker.mask_lonlat(self[, lon, lat, ...])

Mask a lon/lat box

Summary methods¶

NCTracker.anomaly_annual(self[, var, ...])

Calculate annual anomalies based on a baseline period The anomoly is calculated by first calculating the climatological mean for the given baseline period.

NCTracker.phenology(self[, var, silent, cores])

Calculate phenologies from the tracker.

Statistical methods¶

NCTracker.sum(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the sum of all values.

NCTracker.mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the mean of all values.

NCTracker.min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the minimums of all values.

NCTracker.cum_sum(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the cumulative sums of all values.

NCTracker.cor_space(self[, var1, var2, silent])

Calculate the correlation correct between two variables in space, and for each time step

NCTracker.cor_time(self[, var1, var2, silent])

Calculate the correlation correct in time between two variables, for each grid cell

NCTracker.spatial_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate an area weighted spatial mean of variables.

NCTracker.spatial_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate a spatial minimum of variables.

NCTracker.spatial_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate a spatial maximum of variables.

NCTracker.spatial_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate a spatial range of variables.

NCTracker.monthly_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the monthly mean for each year/month combination in files.

NCTracker.monthly_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the monthly minimums for each year/month combination in files.

NCTracker.monthly_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the monthly maximum for each year/month combination in files.

NCTracker.monthly_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the monthly range for each year/month combination in files.

NCTracker.daily_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily mean climatology.

NCTracker.daily_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily minimum climatology.

NCTracker.daily_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily maximum climatology.

NCTracker.daily_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily mean climatology.

NCTracker.daily_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily range climatology.

NCTracker.monthly_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly mean climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly minimum climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly maximum climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly range climatologies.

NCTracker.yearly_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the yearly mean

NCTracker.yearly_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the yearly minimum

NCTracker.yearly_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the yearly maximum

NCTracker.yearly_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the yearly range

NCTracker.seasonal_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal mean for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal minimum for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal maximum for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal range for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal mean climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal minimum climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal maximum climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal range climatology

Seasonal methods¶

NCTracker.seasonal_mean(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal mean for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_min(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal minimum for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_max(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal maximum for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_range(self[, silent, cores])

Calculate the seasonal range for each year.

NCTracker.seasonal_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal mean climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal minimum climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal maximum climatology

NCTracker.seasonal_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a seasonal range climatology

NCTracker.select_season(self, season[, ...])

Select season from tracker

Merging methods¶

NCTracker.merge(self[, silent, zip])

Merge a multi-file ensemble into a single file.

NCTracker.merge_time(self[, silent, zip])

Time-based merging of a multi-file ensemble into a single file.

merge_trackers(\*trackers[, silent])

Climatology methods¶

NCTracker.daily_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily mean climatology.

NCTracker.daily_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily minimum climatology.

NCTracker.daily_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily maximum climatology.

NCTracker.daily_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily mean climatology.

NCTracker.daily_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate a daily range climatology.

NCTracker.monthly_mean_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly mean climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_min_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly minimum climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_max_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly maximum climatologies.

NCTracker.monthly_range_climatology(self[, ...])

Calculate the monthly range climatologies.

Splitting methods¶

NCTracker.split_year(self[, silent])

Split the ensemble based on years.

NCTracker.split_year_month(self[, silent])

Split the ensemble based on years and months.

NCTracker.split_day(self[, silent])

Split the ensemble based on days.

NCTracker.split_season(self[, silent])

Split the ensemble based on season.

Display methods¶

NCTracker.view(self)

Open the current tracker's file in ncview

NCTracker.times(self)

NCTracker.depths(self)

function to get the depths available in a netcdf file

NCTracker.numbers(self)

NCTracker.show_years(self)

NCTracker.show_months(self)

NCTracker.show_levels(self)

Output methods¶

NCTracker.to_netcdf(self, out[, zip, overwrite])

Save a tracker to a named file

NCTracker.to_xarray(self[, decode_times])

Open a tracker as an xarray object

NCTracker.zip(self[, silent, cores])

Zip the tracker

Miscellaneous methods¶

NCTracker.cell_areas(self[, silent, cores, join])

Calculate the cell areas in square meters

NCTracker.cdo_command(self, command[, ...])

Apply a cdo command to a tracker
